Sentencas: A 3D simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells is presented.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The aim of this work is to predict current density, flow, temperature and concentration fields in order to compare and optimize repeat element geometry for a whole stack.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A commercial CFD tool was used, solving mass, momentum and energy equations; whereas chemical kinetic equations are computed from external sub-routines.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A steady-state case is presented, fed with hydrogen.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The flow is laminar for both air and fuel.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Radiative heat transfer is taken into account between inner surfaces.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: On boundaries, convective and radiative heat transfers are assumed at external surfaces between repeat element and oven.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Due to the large range of dimensions (cells: 300 mum thick, gas channels: 1 mm height, whole cell: 80 mm x 80 mm) a fine mesh was needed.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Data for conductivities and kinetics were estimated from experiments performed in-house.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Simulation results are presented and compared to real repeat element test measurements for the current-potential characteristics.
Titulo: CFD simulation tool for solid oxide fuel cells
